# Welcome to the handbook for LNN @ UCPH! {.unnumbered}

## [Click here to return to our lab website](https://lnn-ucph.github.io/)

## How to use the handbook
This is a guide for prospective, new, and current members of LNN-UCPH. 
The handbook provides an overview of our lab philosophy and practical information on how to get started on a research project.
Whether you're a new member of the lab looking for onboarding help, an existing member who is curious about obtaining your own funding, or a prospective student wondering about our lab culture, this is the place for you!
If you have a suggestion or comment on the handbook, please reach out to Melanie or Martin.

::: callout-note
Note to lab members: this document is a work in progress and may change.
It is your responsibility to be familiar with the content, so you should review these policies regularly.
:::
